amendment.description: Amendment restores dog deer hunting in Kisatchie National Forest in Louisiana.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 113-339 to restore hunting access to the Kisatchie National Forest for deer hunting with dogs. Includes private property protections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fleming.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
